page.title: 03FARMING AROUND COWBIT
page.content: The farmers around Cowbit usually start work at about 7:30am.Mister Banks has the largest area,1500 acres of which are cereals. In our area the most popular crops are cereals, sugar beet, vegetables and flowers. The land is mostly owned by farms and nurseries.There are very few animals except for some cattle and sheep.We have one farmer, Mr. Cooke, who breeds Shire horses and has won many major prizes at Wembley, the Royal Show and the Lincolnshire Show. The farmers in the area own a variety of machinery ranging from tractors to various harvesters. The farms tend to be a family concern and staff are usually part of the family with a few seasonal helpers.
